title: Cabin 28: The Keddie Murders
description: CABIN 28: THE KEDDIE MURDERS is unlike any other true crime book on the market today. Beautifully designed in a "coffee table" book style, each page is hand-designed by the authors. The book features rare photographs, extensive interviews, historical data, personal anecdotes, and unique artwork that reflects the disturbing nature of the story. Representing nearly ten years of thorough research and investigation, CABIN 28: THE KEDDIE MURDERS would make the perfect addition to any true crime library.
author: D. Sweeney
